name: design-system-linter
description: Design System Linter is a VSCode extension that enforces design system consistency by providing visual cues and warnings for correct token usage.

design-system-linter.designSystem.description: Select the design system to use. Changing this setting requires a reload of the extension.

design-system-linter.enableSpacingLint.description: Enable or disable linting for spacing tokens. Changing this setting requires a reload of the extension.

design-system-linter.enableColorLint.description: Enable or disable linting for color tokens. Changing this setting requires a reload of the extension.

design-system-linter.customSpacingTokens.markdownDescription: An array of custom spacing tokens for the linter to enforce. Each token should be an array with the token name as the first element and the token value as the second element. Changing this setting requires a reload of the extension.

design-system-linter.customColorTokens.markdownDescription: An array of custom color tokens for the linter to enforce. Each token should be an array with the token name as the first element and the token value as the second element. Changing this setting requires a reload of the extension.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
